title: Sampler, 2003-14-11, 1719
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, embossed leather.  
Technique: embroidery in cross stitch, satin stitch, bargello and needlepoint.
provenance:
(M No. 40);  2002 appraisal #42
Purchased from J. Wiltbank
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Worked in colored silks on a fine, sheer linen background.  Central cartouche with date 1719, flowers, coat of arms, basket of fruits, birds and insects, alphabet and numerals, floral bands; at bottom two bands of bargello work and needlepoint fillings; border of gilt-embossed leather.
